THRE.BK.summary: Thai Reinsurance Public Company Limited provides insurance and reinsurance products and services in Thailand. It operates through two segments, Conventional Products and Non-Conventional Products. The company offers reinsurance coverage for property, casualty, accident and health, engineering, and marine cargo. It also provides computer services in relation to motor insurance claim management; claim management and marketing services; and actuarial, training, and advisory services, as well as insurance outsourcing and consulting services. The company develops electronic commerce services. Thai Reinsurance Public Company Limited was founded in 1978 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

THREL-R.BK.long_name: Thaire Life Assurance Public Company Limited
THREL-R.BK.summary: Thaire Life Assurance Public Company Limited provides life reinsurance solutions to various life insurance companies in Thailand. The company operates in two segments, Conventional Products and Non-Conventional Products. It offers ordinary, group, and credit and mortgage term insurance, as well as personal accident, health, accidental riders, etc. insurance products under treaties and facultative basis. Thaire Life Assurance Public Company Limited was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

TQR-R.BK.summary: TQR Public Company Limited provides reinsurance broker and integrated risk transfer services in Thailand. It offers treaty and facultative reinsurance services; and motor car, motorcycle, extended warranty, travel, cyber security, medical malpractice. and director and officer liability insurance services. TQR Public Company Limited was founded in 2012 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.
